name: Dot Line Lightning
description:
This is the sequel of the Dot Line.
The Dot Line was downloaded over 3,000,000
and had been ranked TOP 2 in the United States.

It is a extremely addictive short-term memory game!

Can you remember well?

If you want to check your memory,
you have to play the Dot Line Lightning !!!

● FEATURES
- Classic, Reverse, Panic Mode
- Various patterns and matrices
- Combo System
- Continue, Time, and Hint items
- GameCenter Leaderboards
- GameCenter Achievements

● REQUIREMENTS
- iOS 8.0 or later

● SUPPORT E-MAIL : support@sharpapp.com
